Content: it was useful for a couple of things, but ultimately extremely frustrating... enough to uninstall. 1) it kept crashing when I used my camera for some reason, and 2) it kept asking me if places I visited during the day should be saved as my workplace (I work from home and couldn't indicate this in the app).
It is not working correctly on win 10. It crashes my laptop. I could see hundreds of smarter time icons in system tray.
App is good. But it's crashing all the time.

Liked the idea and I despise the process, why? It simply won't work. It worked for a day and then it froze and kept on crashing. I uninstalled it thrice and still, it freezes and crashes immediately. My phone is a new S7, all updates done.... So I am not sure what is going on. I have kept the app, since I loved the short 24 hours that it worked... I am hoping to see if there is a fix to this issue.
Great promise Great idea! But it constantly crashes, especially in the critically important reports/statistics area. Uninstall, hope to return one day when the app is stable.
